page.title: 09MEDIA
page.content: In a survey of a second year classes favourite television programmes these turned out to be most popular.1---THE YOUNG ONES(comedy) 2-----COVER UP(crime series) 3-----DYNASTY(soap opera) 4--------THREE UP TWO DOWN(comedy) 5-------LAST PLACE ON EARTH(serial) 6------BODYLINE(serial) Strangely,no pop music programmes had any success despite the fact that those questioned were between 13 and 14 years of age. The most commonly sold newspapers are -1)DAILY RECORD,2)THE EXPRESS AND GLASGOW HERALD 3)GUARDIAN. The least popular were 1)THE SUN 2)MIRROR AND SCOTSMAN. The main local paper is the Hamilton Advertiser which carries news about a wide area from Hamilton to Douglas.
